known_issues: Lead entry form shows 'Failed to save lead' error
Admin setup password shows 'backend function not implemented' error

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix the 'Failed to save lead' error in the lead entry form by implementing or correcting the backend addLead function to properly store lead data with all fields (name, mobile, treatment, followUpDate, consultationDate, rating, remarks, status)

Fix the 'backend function not implemented' error in admin password setup by implementing the missing backend functions for admin password management (setAdminPassword, unlockAdmin, or equivalent functions referenced by AdminGateDialog)

projectName: Fix lead save failure and admin password backend errors
